import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { find } from "lodash"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { Map, GoogleApiWrapper } from 'google-maps-react'; import ProfileDetails from "./ProfileDetails"; function Profile() { const mapStyles = { width: '100%', height: '100%' }; const [allUsers, setAllUsers] = useState(null); const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const google = window.google; const history = useHistory(); const apiURL = "https://panorbit.in/api/users.json"; const fetchProfileDetails = async () => { let response = await axios.get(apiURL); setAllUsers(response.data.users); if (response) { let id = history.location.state.user_id; let user = find(response.data.users, ['id', id]); setUser(user); } } useEffect(() => { fetchProfileDetails(); }, []); return (
